description.label: Description
description.value: A larger rudder improves steering, but requires a stronger helmsman because of increased water resistance. Every Boat Handling Test must also be accompanied by a Strength Test; if the Strength Test is successful, its SLs may be added to those of the Boat Handling Test. There is no penalty for an ordinary failure on this additional Strength Test. However, an Astounding Failure or Fumble results a sudden swing of the runner sending the unfortunate Character head first into the water!
